p: We detected a significantly predominant annual component of dengue time series throughout the whole study period for most of the states ( S1 Fig) apart from Roraima and Amapá (two northern states that are also the least populated in Brazil) that had additional strong components with a period of 1.5–2 years, and the southern states of Rio Grande do Sul and Santa Catarina that had very few dengue cases for several years.
